 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָהַל‎</span>] **verb** ==circumcise, weaken== (si vera lectio; compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָהַל‎</span> ***circumcise***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְהַל‎</span> ***id.***); — only figurative **Qal** ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָבְאֵךְ מָהוּל בַּמָּ֑יִם‎</span> [[Isa.1.22|Isa 1:22]] ***thy choice wine weakened with water***, so [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Comm</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]; compare ***vinum castrare***, [[BDB#Plin|Plin]]<sup>xix. 53:</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>Erkl. d. Jes.</sup> [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> (compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl.1886, 741</sup>) compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוהל‎</span>, ***juice*** (of fruit, especially olives); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***oil, liquid pitch, suppurating matter***; see against this [[BDB#Di|Di]]. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֲלָךְ‎</span>] see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הלך‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֲלָל‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֲלַלְאֵל‎</span> see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הלל‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֲלֻמוֺת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הלם‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֲמֹרָה‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֲמֹרוֺת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎המר‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהְפֵּכָה‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהְפֶּ֫כֶת‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הפך‎</span>.
